Posts.EditableText:
At the very top of your object list on the right, expand Objects and make sure 'game' has been expanded. Next, make sure 'Verbs' has been expanded.

All verbs you make will appear in this list. Find the ones you wish to remove/alter, and do so from there.

Also, I would highly recommend creating a backup or two. What I do is save my current project, then save as 'x BU1', 'x BU2', wherein x is the name of the project. Keeping backups is also very handy for when something breaks, as it allows you to compare to previous versions if it works there.
